ModMetaData.name: Export Agency
ModMetaData.author: erdelf
ModMetaData.description:
You ever get tired of setting up bills, outfits, storage settings etc. every new game ? Well then this mod is for you here.
Export for Bills (including medical operations) and Storage Settings DrugPolicies and Outfits are now shared among every Save.
Textures and Preview image done by Halno.
